main.name: Chris Sherman
main.bio: Dual American/Australian citizen who grew up in Texas and has come to Sydney for something new. Lover of technology, Hip-Hop, and American Football.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to use this to message me, or via Email.

education.description: Graduated with a Minor in Business. Learned Computer Science fundamentals. Maintained part-time IT helpdesk job throughout.

work.title: Software Engineer
work.description: Developing control software for integrated operations control centers for the WestConnex project. Writing and designing software support documentation for project manuals and test plans. Automating test development for software functionality using Ansible and Python

work.title: Software Engineer - SQA
work.description: Software Quality assurance intern, worked on extensive unit testing, developed large scale tests to detect microcontroller sample app flash failures. Worked with Java/JUnit Testing/python scripting. Worked heavily with Jenkins Continuous Integration to convert freestyle jobs to pipeline jobs

work.title: IT Helpdesk Support
work.description: Provide technical support, troubleshooting, maintenance, and upgrades to clients via ticket based submission system. Wrote scripts to reduce summer maintenance program from 6 months to2 weeks

projects.title: Canadian Wanderlust
projects.category: My Travel Blog for my post-university travels

testimonials.text: A hard worker. Someone that has a strong passion to learn and will do anything to ensure that he is delivering the best quality he can. A lucky asset to have.
Chris was a good hire. Someone very hungry to learn that is not afraid to ask questions. Genuinely great culture fit, and someone you can rely on for client interfacing.
